ARABIC: وَمَنْ خَفَّتْ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ فَأُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ خَسِرُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ فِى جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Those whose scales are light, they are the losers of their selves, remaining in Hell timelessly, for ever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But those whose scales are lighter will perish and abide in Hell for ever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and those whose scales are light, those will be the ones who will have courted loss. They will abide in Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: but if it weighs less, one will be lost forever in hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And the ones whose scales prove light – it is they who put their lives into ruin, remaining in hell forever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And those whose Scales (of good deeds) are light, they are those who lose themselves, in Hell will they abide.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And as for him whose good deeds are light, these are they who shall have lost their souls, abiding in hell
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and he whose scales are light -- they have lost their souls in Gehenna dwelling forever,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And those whose scales are light are those who lose their souls, in hell abiding.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But those whose scales weigh light will have ruined their souls; in Hell will they abide.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And he whose balances shall be light--these are they who have lost themselves: in Hell they are abiders.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: As for those whose deeds weigh light in the scales—they will be the ones who have ruined their souls, and they will remain in hell [forever].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But those whose balance is light, will be those who have lost their souls, in Hell will they abide.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And those whose scales (of good deeds) are light, they are those who lose their ownselves, in Hell will they abide.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: but those whose scales are light shall forfeit their souls and live in Gehenna (Hell) for ever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But those whose scales are light—those are they who have lost their souls; in Hell they will dwell forever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But those whose scales are light - those are the ones who have lost their souls, [being] in Hell, abiding eternally.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:103] and those whose scales are light, because of evil deeds, they are the ones who have lost their souls, and so they will be, abiding in Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And those whose scales are light) with good works (are those who lose their souls, in hell abiding) forever, neither to die or leave.
